titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry stars Jim & Jesse at Frontier City

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Three color half sheet (black and red on yellow) announcing the Grand Ole Opry stars Jim and Jesse with the Virginia Boys, the Homesteaders, Pete Drake, Archie Campbell, and Bobby Smith at the Frontier City on July 17. Poster features metal photoplates of Jim and Jesse, Pete Drake, the Homesteaders and Archie Campbell.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
